message: Hi Bob, I propose we split the $100 with me taking $60 and you taking $40. Let's make sure we both leave with a fair share before the amount decreases!
Hi Alice, considering the money loses value over time, I think we should try to come to an agreement quickly. I propose a 55-45 split in my favor.
Hey Bob, since the value is decreasing, let's keep things simple and split the amount equally. We both get $50 and call it a fair deal.
